message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $10,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I am willing to pay $8,000 for it.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand the value you see in the product, however, I'm looking for something closer to $9,500. It's a fantastic product and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the product's value and my budget, I am willing to pay $9,000 for it.
